channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2024020100
item.description:
Report X-2024020100

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: KEENE
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE LEAKING FROM INSIDE OUT BY FACILITY PACKAGE HANDLER. DESIGNATED RESPONDER MOVED PACKAGE TO DMP. PACKAGE HAD OUTSIDE DIAMOND LABEL #3 FLAMMABLE LIQUID AND LIMITED QUANTITY LABELS. PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND DETERMINED TO BE ISOPROPANOL 4 1 GAL PLASTIC CONTAINERS AND 4 EACH 2 OZ PLASTIC SPRAY BOTTLES 1 OF WHICH HAD EMPTIED ITS CONTENTS.
